title: Problem with the remake system.
body:
I was playing with my 4 premades but one of them gets a problem with his PC in the loading screen, his pc shuts off completely and we just agree to use remake, seemed a lot better than if we all lose 20 LP, as soon as we get into the game I kept trying to use /remake but somehow the game didn't detect anyone who disconnected from the game and we couldn't remake, he tries to get on from another computer but of course he is late to the game and we end up losing.

Why did the game detect him that he is online when clearly he wasn't? His pc wasn't even online

I'm Silver 4 btw.

replies.body: The same thing happened to me in Ranked not so long ago. We had a kha who didnt connect, and we couldnt remake, and altough he comeback like 10 mintues later we ended up losing.
I was glad the whole remake system was made to avoid stuff like this, but now it just seems pointless.
I just had this exact same problem a couple of days ago. Riot still hasn't fixed this problem apparently... it cost me a demotion.
They won't, they will just think that you're lying and won't do anything about it.
That sounds super strange! I'd like to look into this for you, however, I'll need a link to the match from the [match history](http://matchhistory.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/) section of the site.

http://matchhistory.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUN1/1476567958/219152859?tab=overview

There you go. He was the lucian.

I looked into this and it doesn't appear anyone was marked AFK in the match. The /Remake system will trigger once someone has been inactive for 90 seconds or more within the first 3 minutes of the game. It doesn't seem this match was eligible for the /Remake, which is why it wasn't an option in the match. For complete information on this system, check out our [/Remake FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ)

Let me know if you have any additional questions.

I know the Remake system didn't trigger that's why I made this discussion, why didn't the remake system trigger if my friend was afk? Was I like supposed to record him away from his keyboard to prove that he was afk? You acuse me of lying even though you say the exact same reason of why I made this topic.
Anyone gonna look into this or what?
